question: 11th BRICS Summit-2019 has recently started in Brazil under which theme?
option1: Stronger partnership for a brighter future
option2: Economic Growth for an Innovative Future
option3: BRICS Partnership â€“ a Powerful Factor of Global Development
option4: Building Responsive, Inclusive and Collective Solutions
answer: Economic Growth for an Innovative Future
explanation: 11th BRICS Summit has started under the theme \'Economic Growth for an Innovative Future. BRICS brings together five major emerging economies-Brazil, Russia, India, China, South Africa- comprising 42 per cent of the world\'s population, having 23 per cent of t he global GDP and around 17 per cent of the share in world trade. The five nations account for 50 per cent of the world economic growth, 42.58 per cent of the world population and 26.6 per cent of the World Land Area.
